pullRequest.title: Improve forum incorrect password handling
pullRequest.bodyText:
Test post summary no longer severe logs, we expect passwords to be valid and do not want them reported as bug reports. Secondly, this scenario showed two error messages, this update reduces it down to just one.


In-game bad password handling is updated to show a single dialog at a time.

commit.message: Remove duplicate logging, exception is messaged to user further up in callstack

Improve error message when 'failing to get auth token'.

Getting an auth token requires a valid password, it is the most
likely error. Users do not have context to know what 'token' refers
to, the error message is updated here for better formatting and
to be more upfront that a bad password is a likely cause.
